Package teapot.builder.utils.providers

Class CSVProvider

java.lang.Object
teapot.builder.utils.providers.CSVProvider
public final class CSVProvider extends Object
Utility class for handling CSV (Comma-Separated Values) data with object conversion.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public static <T> void save(String absolutePath, List<T> collection, Converter<T> converter)
      Saves a collection of objects to a CSV file using the specified converter.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the collection.
      Parameters:
      absolutePath - The absolute path of the CSV file to save to.
      collection - The collection of objects to be saved.
      converter - The converter used to encode objects into CSV format.

    • load

      public static <T> ArrayList<T> load(String absolutePath, Converter<T> converter)
      Loads a collection of objects from a CSV file using the specified converter.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects to load.
      Parameters:
      absolutePath - The absolute path of the CSV file to load from.
      converter - The converter used to decode CSV lines into objects.
      Returns:
      The list of objects loaded from the CSV file.

    • parseToBytes

      public static <T> byte[] parseToBytes(List<T> collection, Converter<T> converter)
      Converts a collection of objects into a byte array representing CSV data.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the collection.
      Parameters:
      collection - The collection of objects to convert.
      converter - The converter used to encode objects into CSV format.
      Returns:
      The byte array representing CSV data.
